TITLE Black Bean Soup

# In a large pot combine:{ [1 lbs dried black beans][1 item yellow onion[, quartered]][5 cloves garlic[, smashed]]
[1 item chipotle chile][1 tbl adobo sauce][2 tsp ground cumin][2 item bay leaves][6 cup water]}
# Simmer 2 hours or until beans are tender
# Remove the bay leaves.
# Place the onion, chipotle, garlic, and 2 cups of beans in a blender and process until smooth. 
# Return puree to the pot.
# Season with [salt] and [1 tsp apple cider vinegar]
# Top with [cilantro] and [sour cream].
